memoriesPage.title: Memories
memoriesPage.subtitle: A collection of unique moments from past sessions.
memoriesPage.noMemoriesHint: After a session ends, players will have a chance to upload a unique moment. Check back later!

dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Here's what's happening in your volleyball world.
dashboard.noUpcomingSessions: You have no upcoming sessions booked.
dashboard.noAvailableSessions: No other sessions available at the moment.

calendarPage.title: Session Planner
calendarPage.subtitle: Browse the planner to find upcoming sessions. Click a day to see the notes.
calendarPage.noSessionsPinned: No sessions pinned for this day.

announcementsPage.title: Announcement Board
announcementsPage.subtitle: Stay up to date with all the news

chatPage.title: Chats
chatPage.selectChatSubtitle: Choose a conversation to start messaging.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.subtitle: This feature is currently under construction. Please check back later!

profilePage.monthlyActivitySubtitle: Your session count for the last 6 months.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Choose how you want to be notified about sessions and announcements.
notifications.emailSubtitle: Receive updates about sessions and news via email (coming soon).
notifications.pushSubtitle: Get real-time updates on your mobile device (coming soon).

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the app.

loginPage.description: Enter your credentials to access your account.

registerPage.title: Create an Account
registerPage.description: Join the Inverness Eagles community today!

toasts.logoutDescription: You have been successfully logged out.
toasts.authFailedDescription: Please check your email and password.
toasts.incompleteFormDescription: Please select a skill level and favorite position.
toasts.registrationFailedDescription: This email might already be in use or the password is too weak.
toasts.accountCreatedDescription: Please sign in with your new credentials.
toasts.confirmEmailDescription: Please check your email to confirm your account before signing in.
toasts.profileUpdatedDescription: Your profile information has been saved.
toasts.updateFailedDescription: Could not save your profile changes.
toasts.uploadFailedDescription: Could not upload your new avatar.
toasts.avatarUpdatedDescription: Your new avatar has been saved.
toasts.imageTooLargeDescription: Please select an image smaller than {maxSize}MB.
toasts.sessionCreatedDescription: The new session has been successfully added.
toasts.sessionUpdatedDescription: The session has been successfully updated.
toasts.sessionDeletedDescription: The session has been successfully deleted.
toasts.bookingConfirmedDescription: You're all set for the {level} session.
toasts.bookingFailedDescription: Could not book your spot. The session might be full.
toasts.bookingCanceledDescription: Your spot has been successfully canceled.
toasts.cancellationFailedTime: You can only cancel more than 6 hours in advance.
toasts.waitlistJoinedDescription: We'll notify you if a spot opens up.
toasts.waitlistJoinFailedDescription: You might already be on the list.
toasts.waitlistLeftDescription: You have successfully left the waitlist.
toasts.announcementCreatedDescription: The new announcement is now live.
toasts.aiSuggestionError: Sorry, we couldn't generate a suggestion at this time.

deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteDialog.sessionDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the session and remove all associated data.
deleteDialog.announcementDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the announcement.

sessionForm.createDescription: Fill out the form to create a new session.
sessionForm.editDescription: Update the details for this session.

announcementForm.createDescription: Fill out the form to create a new announcement for the corkboard.
announcementForm.editDescription: Update the details for this announcement.
announcementForm.title: Title

sessionDetails.cancellationTooltip: Cancellations must be made more than 6 hours in advance.
sessionDetails.uploadHint: Only one photo per session. It will be permanent!

editProfile.title: Edit Profile
editProfile.description: Update your personal information. Click save when you're done.

generateTeams.title: Generate Teams
generateTeams.description: Choose how you want to generate the teams for this session.
